text:
Hi, I am using POI 1.11_dev version in a web application. it works fine all the 
time if users are creating small size excel files . It also worked fine at the 
first two weeks for creating large size excel files. However, it started broke 
after two weeks, if users have a large job, writing to excel files hangs. For 
small jobs, it's still working. Do you have any idea why this happens? Thanks.
creator: ying.qin@syngenta.com

text: This is almost certainly the same as bug 15375. Have a look at that.
creator: avik@apache.org
